Pyroclastic Tide.name: Pyroclastic Tide
Pyroclastic Tide.flavor: You swing your weapon mightily, channeling a primal fire that washes over your enemies.
Pyroclastic Tide.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each enemy within 2 squares of you takes fire damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Volcanic Rage.name: Volcanic Rage
Volcanic Rage.flavor: Your weapon is sheathed in flame as you strike. Your wrath boils over, radiating from your molten skin and scorching nearby foes.
Volcanic Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the volcano. Until the rage ends, as the first action of each of your turns, you can deal 5 + your Constitution modifier fire damage to each enemy within 3 squares of you as a free action. In addition, if an adjacent enemy hits you, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls against that enemy until the end of your next turn.

Serenity of Stone.name: Serenity of Stone
Serenity of Stone.flavor: You skin becomes hard as stone, allowing you to shrug off even the most potent attacks.
Serenity of Stone.effect: You gain resist 10 to all damage until you use a rage power or until the end of the encounter.
